title: Saeed's International Market & Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Middle Eastern and Mediterranean food grocery store with a small cafe. The vegan suitable items are marked with V. Sample items such as sweet pepper pie, zaatar pie, Fiona's salad, hummus and falafel patties, falafel in pita or salad, and other wraps.
